--- title: "Data Acquisition" author: "Arash Amiririgi" --- **A small database from [Radon-bikes](https://www.radon-bikes.de):** *Code* ::: {.cell hash='02_data_acquisition_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_e71b131e21a355ebb78622115c766191'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(rvest) library(stringr) library(tibble) library(httr) library(jsonlite) library(purrr) library(glue) library(xopen) library(rmarkdown) ## mountain E-bikes url <- 'https://www.radon-bikes.de/e-bike/mountainbike/' html <- read_html(url) ### model mountain_ebike <- html %>% html_nodes(css = ".row > h2") %>% html_text() %>% as_tibble() ### price mountain_ebike <- mountain_ebike %>% mutate(new_col=(html %>% html_nodes(css = ".currency_eur .m-serienpanel__price--active") %>% html_text() %>% str_remove_all(' €'))) ### column names mountain_ebike <- mountain_ebike %>% set_names(c('model', 'price')) ## trekking Ebikes url2 <- 'https://www.radon-bikes.de/e-bike/trekking/' html2 <- read_html(url2) ### model trekking_ebike <- html2 %>% html_nodes(css = ".row > h2") %>% html_text() %>% as_tibble() ### price trekking_ebike <- trekking_ebike %>% mutate(new_col=(html2 %>% html_nodes(css = ".currency_eur .m-serienpanel__price--active") %>% html_text() %>% str_remove_all(' €'))) ### column names trekking_ebike <- trekking_ebike %>% set_names(c('model', 'price')) #### merging two tables ebike_radon <- bind_rows(mountain_ebike, trekking_ebike) ``` ::: *Table* ::: {.cell hash='02_data_acquisition_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_568964967464447c91434f81111e8e74'} ```{.r .cell-code} ebike_radon ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: :::
